issue.title: [CI] Use docker buildkit's inline cache to reuse build cache across different hosts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11641](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11641). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Docker buildkit supports cache inlining, which means that the cache manifest gets bundled in the produced docker image. This helps us to avoid cache misses on different hosts, greatly improving the image reusability (regarding the build speed).
